sentences.en: Originally I thought it would be a dud, since the Cassiniobservations comes back with a cometary origin composition of pristine, unprocessed organics in the jets.
sentences.cn: 原来我以为这会是一个哑弹，自从卡西尼观测彗星原始的起源组成归来，未加工的有机物在彗发里。

sentences.en: So the cometary dust work had to take priority.
sentences.cn: 也因此彗星尘埃的工作获得了优先.

sentences.en: The cometary ejection play a crucial role in formation and evolution of the meteoroid stream.
sentences.cn: 彗星的喷发速度在流星群的演化过程中起着重要作用.

sentences.en: This cometary debris – bits of ice – create a meteor shower.
sentences.cn: 这些彗星的残骸——少量的冰——形成了流星雨.

sentences.en: We just released the findings from our preliminary analysis on the cometary side.
sentences.cn: 我们刚刚发表了来自彗星尘埃初步分析的发现.

sentences.en: Whether a cometary outburst with a jet can cause observable short - term non gravitational effect is investigated.
sentences.cn: 探讨伴有喷流的彗星爆发是否造成可观测的非引力效应.
